Config.SQL-SCRIPT: CREATE TABLE {table-name} ( ID bigint, Time timestamp, Index numeric(10,2), VolAmount numeric(30,0), VolMoney numeric(30,2), CONSTRAINT PK_{table-name}_ID PRIMARY KEY(ID) ); CREATE SEQUENCE {table-name}_SEQ INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1;

CREATE TABLE {table-name} ( ID bigint, Time timestamp, Price numeric(10,2), VolAmount numeric(20,0), VolMoney numeric(20,2), Flag integer, CONSTRAINT PK_{table-name}_ID PRIMARY KEY(ID) ); CREATE SEQUENCE {table-name}_SEQ INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1;

CREATE TABLE {table-name} ( Code char(6), Name varchar(20), Area varchar(100), CapitalStockInCirculation numeric(20,2), GeneralCapital numeric(20,2), ListingDate date, PrimaryIncome numeric(20,2), EarningsPerShare numeric(10,4), NetAssetPerShare numeric(10,2), AccumulationFundPerShare numeric(10,2), UndistributedProfitPerShare numeric(10,2), NetProfit numeric(20,2), UpdateTime date, CONSTRAINT PK_{table-name}_CD PRIMARY KEY(Code) );

CREATE TABLE {table-name} ( ID bigint, Date date, Code char(6), Open numeric(10,2), Close numeric(10,2), High numeric(10,2), Low numeric(10,2), VolAmount numeric(30,0), VolMoney numeric(30,2), CONSTRAINT PK_{table-name}_ID PRIMARY KEY(ID) ); CREATE SEQUENCE {table-name}_SEQ INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1;

CREATE TABLE {table-name} ( ID bigint, Date date, Code char(6), Open numeric(10,2), Close numeric(10,2), High numeric(10,2), Low numeric(10,2), VolAmount numeric(20,0), VolMoney numeric(20,2), CONSTRAINT PK_{table-name}_ID PRIMARY KEY(ID) ); CREATE SEQUENCE {table-name}_SEQ INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1;

CREATE TABLE {table-name} ( ID bigint, Code char(6), Time timestamp,
Open numeric(10,2), Close numeric(10,2), High numeric(10,2), Low numeric(10,2), Average numeric(10,2), VolAmount numeric(20,0), VolMoney numeric(20,2), CONSTRAINT PK_{table-name}_ID PRIMARY KEY(ID) ); CREATE SEQUENCE {table-name}_SEQ INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1;
CREATE TABLE {table-name} ( ID bigint, EMA12 numeric(10,4), EMA26 numeric(10,4), DIFF numeric(10,4), DEA numeric(10,4), BAR numeric(10,4), CONSTRAINT PK_{table-name}_ID PRIMARY KEY(ID) );

CREATE TABLE {table-name} ( ID bigint, RSI1 numeric(10,4), RSI2 numeric(10,4), RSI3 numeric(10,4), RSI1MaxEma numeric(10,4), RSI1ABSEma numeric(10,4), RSI2MaxEma numeric(10,4), RSI2ABSEma numeric(10,4), RSI3MaxEma numeric(10,4), RSI3ABSEma numeric(10,4), CONSTRAINT PK_{table-name}_ID PRIMARY KEY(ID) );

CREATE TABLE {table-name} ( ID integer, Code char(6), Time timestamp,
PAVG30_ORIENT smallint, PAVG30_DAYS integer, PAVG30_VALUE numeric(10,6), PAVG30_Date1 date, PAVG30_Date2 date,
DEA_ORIENT smallint, DEA_DAYS integer, DEA_VALUE numeric(10,6), DEA_Date1 date, DEA_Date2 date,
RSI_VALUE1 numeric(10,4), RSI_VALUE2 numeric(10,4), RSI_VALUE3 numeric(10,4), RSI_Date date, CONSTRAINT PK_{table-name}_ID PRIMARY KEY(ID) ); CREATE SEQUENCE {table-name}_SEQ INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1;
DELETE FROM STK_MACD_TD WHERE ID IN (SELECT ID FROM STK_DAILY_TD WHERE CODE = :CODE)
DELETE FROM STK_RSI_TD WHERE ID IN (SELECT ID FROM STK_DAILY_TD WHERE CODE = :CODE)
